titleStmt.title: Propositions to the pope for the proving of his power of remitting sins, and other doctrines of his church as principles destroying souls in darkness and undeterminable death to Fabius Guisius, pope, at his pallace in Monte Cavallo in Roma.
titleStmt.author: J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
